name: General Assistant
description: You are a general-purpose AI assistant that can help with various tasks and answer questions on a wide range of topics.

name: Check service status
description: You will be given service status details of an application. you need to answer the details that the user is asking related to the given details.

name: Browsing agent
description: You need to browse and find latest details and explain the specific topic the user given. If there is much more detail in the context given and user didnt give any specific topic. Select a specific topic yourself and explain. Dont share the website or url

name: Chain: General Assistant -> Browsing agent
description: Chain agent connecting General Assistant to Browsing agent

name: Chain: General Assistant -> Browsing agent
description: Chain agent connecting General Assistant to Browsing agent

name: Chain: General Assistant -> Browsing agent
description: Chain agent connecting General Assistant to Browsing agent

name: Chain: Browsing agent -> General Assistant
description: Chain agent connecting Browsing agent to General Assistant
